page.title: 02Playground games
page.content: {Ball tag}is a good and exciting game. You have one ball. The person who is 'on it' has to hit someone with the ball. The person who has been hit by the ball is then 'on it'. The people who are not 'on it' can only pick up the ball with their wrists. {War}is a good game as well. There are sides, sometimes British, sometimes German or American. In winter we sometimes have {snowball fights.}One day I had a snowball down my back. Also in winter we play {skidding on the ice; }we go at about 50mph.
